document.bingtitle: WHATS COOKING? - Farmer Frank's Farm Market
document.description: If there is a special pie or cake you need, place your order. ... HOMEMADE ICE CREAM WHY PICK UP SUPPER AT A FAST FOOD RESTAURANT WHEN YOU CAN HAVE GOOD HOME COOKED MEALS ...
document.body:
FARMER FRANK'S FARM MARKET
Home Page ANTIQUES&COLLECTIBLES Jams, Pickles&More Peanuts Flags&Garden Decor Boiled Peanuts Cast Iron Veggies&Fruits WHATS COOKING? CANDIES
FARMER FRANK'S FARM MARKET
FARMER FRANK'S is the place to come for home cooking.
DAILY MEAL SPECIALS INCLUDE:
SUNDAY: CHICKEN MONDAY: HAMBURGER STEAK TUESDAY: PORK CHOPS WEDNESDAY: COOK'S CHOICE THURSDAY: MEATLOAF FRIDAY: FISH SATURDAY: LASAGNA If you need catering, give us a call.
OUR MENU
Sandwiches including Country Ham, Turkey, Club and Peanut Butter and Jelly, Soups such as Brunswick Stew and Beef Vegetable, BBQ, Chicken and Dumplings, Hamburgers and Hotdogs.
Our Chicken and Dumplings are homemade! We even make the pastry. Pick up a hot cup or take a large container home to feed the whole family.
Our jacks might not be the prettiest but they sure do taste good. Homemade! That's right. Even the filling is made from the sweet potato or the apple. It doesn't come from a can.
Try our baked goods. We have pies, cakes and breads.
Try our Homemade Chocolate Covered Peanuts
and Chocolate Covered Peanut Brittle
If you are planning an event, give us a call. We do prepare foods in large quantities. If there is a special pie or cake you need, place your order.
Other items we have available:
POTATO SALAD CANDY YAMS COLLARDS CHICKEN SALAD BUTTER BEANS& CORN KALE CRAB SALAD OYSTERS PEACH COBBLER BANANA PUDDING ICED TEA LEMONADE HOMEMADE ICE CREAM
WHY PICK UP SUPPER AT A FAST FOOD RESTAURANT WHEN YOU CAN HAVE GOOD HOME COOKED MEALS FROM FARMER FRANK'S?
10% OFF Take this coupon to the farm market to get 10% discount on your next meal. Discount is for the " meal of the day ." EXPIRES 11/01/2012
